profile:
Providing quality workmanship with clean, affordable pricing is what Peace Arch Plumbing & Heating is committed to. As a small local plumbing company, I Aymeric, am committed to providing you a service that is honest, reliable and clean. 

Call today to speak with me in person for any advice you may need. (PH: 778-998-6420)

Some of our services include: drain cleaning, water heaters, on-demand water heaters, boiler installations, pipe camera inspections, bathtub and shower installations, ect. We can even renovate your kitchens and bathrooms and help with that drywall repair!! 

Servicing: White Rock, Surrey, Langley, Delta, Vancouver Richmond,

services:
We provide all plumbing services big or small. From a leaky sink to a new construction home. A list of some of our services.
Hot Water Tanks, Clogged drains, Renovations, Camera Drain Scoping, Furnace Cleaning, Furnace installations, Fire Places, Shower and Bath. We will even take care of your kitchen and bathroom renovations start to finish. Tile, Paint, Drywall Water proofing, Custom Showers.

profile:
Vancouver is our home, and as a family owned and operated business, we strive every day to provide the best possible services for our friends and neighbors. We’re a community-based business, which is why we offer the lowest prices guaranteed, senior discounts, and fast and reliable services.
 
With more than 30 years of combined experience in the industry, Speedy Plumbing is a name you can trust for all of your plumbing, drainage, and heating services. We help with trenchless waterlines, waterline replacement, plumbing, drainage, perimeter drain services, water line repair, hot water tanks, and strata and property managers. 
 
If you find yourself in need of plumbing services, give us a call at one of our many Vancouver area offices and discover what it means to receive the best possible plumbing services from a business that views you as a friend.
 
Speedy Plumbing and Rooter offers the following benefits to all customers:
 
Prompt, 60-minute service
Guaranteed lowest prices
Free estimates
Price beat guarantee
24/7 service and repairs
Senior discounts offered
Specials and promotions
name: Speedy Plumbing And Rooter

profile:
At Reliance Home Comfort (formerly Canada Furnace), the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are so well known for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

To help with prevention, we are taking the following precautionary measures to protect our Customers.

Our Team Members have been equipped with an ample supply of:

* Hand sanitizers
* Disinfectant wipes
* Masks
* Single-use gloves
* Boot covers

We know that this is a difficult time for all and we want you to know that we will be there for you and are taking all the necessary precautions to keep you and your family comfortable and safe.

Canada Furnace is one of the biggest and most well established heating and air conditioning companies in greater Vancouver and the entire lower mainland. We provide full service and installation on all of your heating, cooling, plumbing, water heater and air purification systems. Established in 1981 we pride ourselves for a high level of customer service to match our extremely helpful and well trained technicians.
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!
